text: Vonage is an American telecommunications company. The company is a publicly held business cloud based communications provider. It is headquartered in Holmdel Township, New Jersey. The company was founded in 2001 as a provider of residential telecommunications services based on voice over Internet Protocol (VoIP). In July 2022, Ericsson completed its acquisition of Vonage for $6.2 billion. == References == Category:American telephone companies Category:Companies based in New Jersey Category:2001 establishments in the United States
title: Vonage
